title: 关于我如何战胜恐惧并爱上工具盒
content:
[[module CSS]]
.content-panel .content-type-title > p {
  margin: 0;
}
.content-panel .content-type-title {
  font-size: 120%;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding: 5px 20px;
  background-color: #666;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px 8px 0 0;
  box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.8),
    inset 0 15px 1px rgba(255,255,255,.2),
    inset 0 15px 10px rgba(255,255,255,.2);
}
.content-panel .content-type-description {
padding: 0 20px;
text-align: justify;
}
.content-panel.content-row .content-type-description {
padding: 5px 20px;
}
.content-panel.content-row .content-type-description-2 {
padding: 0 20px;
text-align: justify;
}

.list-pages-box tr > td:first-child > div {
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-align-items: center;
    align-items: center;
}
.list-pages-box tr > td:first-child > div > div:first-child {
    -webkit-flex-grow: 1;
    flex-grow: 1;
}
.list-pages-box tr > td:first-child > div img.wanderers {
    min-width: 16px;
    width: 16px;
    height: 11px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5);
}
.list-pages-box tr > td:first-child > div > div:not(.wanderers):not(.wanderers-adult) > img.wanderers {
    display: none;
}
[[/module]]


[[tabview]]


[[tab 最近论坛发帖]]
[[module RecentPosts]]
[[/tab]]

[[tab 无标签的艺作页整理]]

**[[[zhongfenshouhezuo|中分兽同人创作！]]]**

**[[[ziyulaila|诶——！梓鱼的中分表情包居然从墙上跳了下来！ ]]]**

**[[[rkatsitelicc-art|R418黑 历 史之基金会壁纸合集（至2020.8]]]**

**[[[m-yansher|12的模板画们]]]**

**[[[goi-2|GOI球漫画#2]]]**

**[[[dr-ghostwood-artwork|Dr.GhostWood的被模因侵染了的艺作页]]]**


[[/tab]]
[[tab 暴云荒野系列整理]]

------
[[include component:image-block name= https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/local--files/kcorena-s-artwork/暴云荒野.svg |caption=暴云荒野系列标志|height=250px|width=250px]]

by [[*user Aplous]]

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/aplous5-1 暴云荒野：阿斯托里亚反馈程序]
 * 对象：[[*user Swred]]、[[*user Zenerry]]、[[*user the Jotaro]]、[[*user Auroriaaaaa]]、[[*user ScrantonCaspar326]]

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/aplous5-2 暴云荒野：缺陷纲领]
 * 对象：[[*user the chen luo]]、[[*user pppppsssssp]]

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/aplous5-3 暴云荒野：1024-SD心理窥视]
 * 对象：[[*user Kcorena]]、[[*user Widednl]]、[[*user Dr Aurora Owl]]

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/aplous5-4 暴云荒野：执着演绎]
 * 对象：[[*user RainTree]]、[[*user Diamond_Apple]]、[[*user JosephJoestar]]、[[*user Auroriaaaaa]] 提供的私设“地狱”、[[*user Zenerry]] 提供的私设“Jones”

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/aplous5-5 暴云荒野：封闭]
 * 对象：[[*user Sirius Dawn]]、[[*user Frozen starry sky]]、[[*user Donuts Exusiai]]、[[*user Auroriaaaaa]] 提供的私设“Zion”

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/aplous5-6 暴云荒野：一半]
 * 对象： [[*user Auroriaaaaa]] 提供的私设“墨”、[[*user Auroriaaaaa]] 提供的私设“林”

------

by [[*user Dr_Naxurt]]

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/why-cant-we-see-the-rain 暴云荒野：雷雨之夜]
 * 对象：[[*user Aplous]]

------

by [[*user CaroyalKKaia]]

* [https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/rosmarinus-officinalis 暴云荒野：迷迭香]
 * 对象：[[*user YUANNN]]、[[*user Dr_Naxurt]]

------

[[tab CN整千实时]]

+ CN1K
[[collapsible show="CN1000竞赛参赛者" hide="这鬼东西真的太长了收起来吧" hideLocation="both"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">-1" order="rating desc" category="*" separate="false" tags="原创 +cn1000 -竞赛" perPage="200"]]
**{{%%index%%}}**. **%%title_linked%%** **{{[+%%rating%% (+[[#expr (%%rating_votes%%+%%rating%%)/2]]/-[[#expr (%%rating_votes%%-%%rating%%)/2]])]}}**
